data_table.description: Health/Medical History, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HHXBFLAG
variable.description: 1 = if form is present [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXBCY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB01A
variable.description: [Medical care]. How long has it been since you last saw a doctor for any reason? Q1. Years [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB01B
variable.description: [Medical care]. How long has it been since you last saw a doctor for any reason? Q1. Months [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB02
variable.description: [Medical care]. How often do you have a routine physical examination, that is, not for a particular illness, but for a general check up? Q2 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]
variable.value: At least once every five years
Less than one every five years
Do not have routine physical examinations

variable.name: HHXB03
variable.description: [Medical care]. Do you have health insurance, such as Medicare, or a medical plan, such as an HMO, which pays part of a hospital, doctor's, or surgeon's Bill? Q3 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB04
variable.description: [Medical care]. When you want help with a health problem, where do you usually go? By a health problem I mean an illness, a question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. Q4 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB04A
variable.description: [Medical care]. When you want help with a health problem, where do you usually go? By a health problem I mean an illness, a question or concern, or a need for a test or treatment. If Other, specify. Q4A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05A
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or never tested.) Q5 High blood pressure or hypertension (high blood). Q5A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05B
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had Any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or Never Tested). Q5. High blood cholesterol. Q5B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05C
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or Never Tested.). Q5. Heart attack. Q5C [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05D
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or Never Tested). Q5. Diabetes (sugar in the blood). Q5D [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05E
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or Never Tested). Q5. Chronic lung disease, such as chronic bronchitis, or emphysema. Q5E [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05F
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or Never Tested). Q5. Asthma. Q5F [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05G
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or Never Tested). Q5. Cancer. Q5G [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05H
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or never tested.) Q5. Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? Q5H [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05J
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or never tested.) Q5. Have you had another cancer? Q5J [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05K
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: (read each disease name and code N if No or never tested.) Q5. Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? Q5K [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB06
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Have you ever had to sleep on 2 or more pillows to help you breathe? Q6 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB07
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Have you ever been awakened at night by trouble breathing? Q7 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB08
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Have you ever had swelling of your feet or ankles (excluding during pregnancy)? [Include parenthetical comment for females only.] Q8 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB09
variable.description: [Congestive heart failure]. Did it tend to come on during the day and go down overnight? Q9 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB10
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Sex of participant. Q10 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB11
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Has this participant had a vasectomy at the time of visit 1? [See PIN sheet]. Q11 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB12
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had a vasectomy (sperm tubes tied)? Q12 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB13
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At approximately what age did you have this operation? Q13 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB14
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Did the participant have menstrual periods within 2 years prior to visit 1? [See PIN sheet]. Q14 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB15
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had any menstrual periods during the past 2 years? Q15 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB17
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. In the past 2 Years, how many periods did you miss? [If 00 go to item 21]. Q17 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB18
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you ever reached menopause? Q18 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB19
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At approximately what age did menopause begin? Q19 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB20
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Was your menopause natural or the result of surgery or radiation? Q20 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB21
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you having hot flashes? Q21 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB22
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Since your first ARIC exam on (date) have you taken or used any female hormone pills, dermal patches, shots, or implants? Q22 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB23A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Please give me the names of all female hormones you have used since that exam, starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Name 1. Q23A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB23B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Concentration - first hormone. Q23B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB23C
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Concentration - second hormone (if any). Q23C [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB24
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Code 1. Q24 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB25
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you start taking this hormone for the first time? Q25 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB26
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you currently taking this hormone? Q26 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB27
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you stop taking this hormone? Q27 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB28A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your first ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Q28. Years. Q28A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB28B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your first ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Q28. Months. Q28B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB29A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How many days do/did you take this hormone in a 4 week period? Q29A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB29B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On A typical day when you take/took this hormone, how many pills, dermal patches, shots, or implants do/did you take or use? Q29B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB30A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Name 2. Q30A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB30B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Concentration - first hormone. Q30B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB30C
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Concentration - second hormone (if any). Q30C [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB31
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Code 2. Q31 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB32
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you start taking this hormone for the first time? Q32 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB33
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Are you currently taking this hormone? Q33 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB34
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At what age did you stop taking this hormone? Q34 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB35A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your first ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Q35. Years. Q35A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB35B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. For how long altogether since your first ARIC exam have you used this hormone? Q35. Months. Q35B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB36A
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How many days do/did you take this hormone in a 4 week period? Q36A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB36B
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. On a typical day when you take/took this hormone, how many pills, dermal patches, shots, or implants do/did you take or use? Q36B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB37
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Did participant have a partial or total hysterectomy or oophorectomy at the time of visit one? [See PIN sheet]. Q37 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB38
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. At your last visit on (date), you reported prior surgery to have your uterus or ovaries removed. Have you had additional surgery on your uterus or ovaries? Q38 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB39
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had surgery to have your uterus or ovaries removed? (That is, a partial or total hysterectomy or oophorectomy). Q39 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB40
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Has your uterus (womb) been removed? Q40 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB41
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How old were you when this operation was performed? Q41 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB42
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. Have you had either one or both ovaries removed? Q42 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB43
variable.description: [Reproductive history]. How old were you when this operation was performed? Q43 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB44
variable.description: [Smoking]. Have you ever smoked cigarettes? [Code No if less than 400 cigarettes in a lifetime]. Q44 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB45
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do you now smoke cigarettes? Q45 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB46
variable.description: [Smoking]. When did you smoke your last cigarette? Q46 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB47
variable.description: [Smoking]. Prior to quitting, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke per day? [Code 00 if less than one per day]. Q47 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB48
variable.description: [Smoking]. How many cigarettes do you smoke per day now? [Code 00 if less than one per day]. Q48 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB49
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do/did you inhale the cigarette smoke? Q49 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB50
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do you now smoke a pipe? Q50 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB51
variable.description: [Smoking]. How much pipe tobacco are you smoking now? [Record oz per week: a standard pouch of tobacco contains 1 1/2 oz. Code 00 if less than one oz. per week]. Q51 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB52
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do you inhale the pipe smoke? Q52 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB53
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do you now smoke cigars or cigarillos? Q53 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB54
variable.description: [Smoking]. How many (cigars/cigarillos) do you smoke per week now? [Code 00 if less than one per week]. Q54 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB55
variable.description: [Smoking]. Do you inhale the (cigar/cigarillo) smoke? Q55 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB56A
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you are currently using or have ever used chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum prescribed by a doctor; for example Nicorette. [If Yes, probe for current or past use] chewing tobacco. Q56A [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB56B
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you are currently using or have ever used chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum prescribed by a doctor; for example Nicorette. [If Yes, probe for current or past use] snuff. Q56B [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB56C
variable.description: [Smoking]. Please tell me if you are currently using or have ever used chewing tobacco, snuff, or nicotine gum prescribed by a doctor; for example Nicorette. [If Yes, probe for current or past use]. Nicotine gum [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB57
variable.description: [Smoking]. ASK NON-SMOKERS ONLY: during the past year, about how many hours per week on the average, were you in close contact with people when they were smoking? For example, in your home, in a car, at work, or other close quarter. Q57 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB58
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Do you presently drink alcoholic beverages? Q58 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB59
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Have you ever consumed alcoholic beverages? Q59 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB60
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Approximately how many years ago did you stop drinking? Q60 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB61
variable.description: [Alcohol]. For how many years did you drink alcoholic beverages? Q61 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB62A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. In the past , which types of alcoholic beverages did you ordinarily drink? Q62. Wine [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB62B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. In the past , which types of alcoholic beverages did you ordinarily drink? Q62. Beer [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB62C
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Drank beverages - hard liquor. Q62c [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB62D
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Drank beverages - other. Q62d [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB63
variable.description: [Alcohol]. What was the usual number of drinks you had per week before you stopped drinking alcoholic beverages? One drink means 1 beer or 1 glass of wine or 1 shot of liquor or one mixed drink. [Record 00 if less than one drink per week]. Q63 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB64
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many glasses of wine do you usually have per week? [4 oz. glasses; round down]. Q64 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB65
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many bottles or cans of beer do you usually have per week? [12 oz. bottles or cans; round down]. Q65 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB66
variable.description: [Alcohol]. How many drinks of hard liquor do you usually have per week? [1 1/2 oz. shots; round down]. Q66 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB67
variable.description: [Alcohol]. During the past 24 hours, how many drinks have you had? [If 0 go to item 69]. Q67 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB68A
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Wine drunk past 24 hours? Q68a [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB68B
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Beer drunk past 24 hours? Q68b [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB68C
variable.description: [Alcohol]. Liquor drunk past 24 hours? Q68c [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB69
variable.description: [Occupation]. I would like you to Look at this card while I read it to you. Please tell me the letter of the response which best describes your CURRENT occupation. [Hand card to respondent and read each response category]. Q69 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]
variable.value: Homemaking, not working outside the home
Employed at a job for pay, either full or part time
Employed, but temporarily away from my regular work
Retired from my usual occupation and not working
Retired from my usual occupation but working for pay

variable.name: HHXB70
variable.description: [Occupation]. Was this participant retired at visit 1? [See PIN sheet]. Q70 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB71
variable.description: [Occupation]. Did you retire because of health reasons? Q71 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB73
variable.description: [Handedness]. Are you right-handed or left-handed? Q73 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05IMONTHS
variable.description: Months of date of cancer diagnosis since exam 1 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB16MONTHS
variable.description: Months of last menstruation since exam 1 [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: HHXB05LMONTHS
variable.description: [Medical care]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following: high blood pressure or hypertension, high blood cholesterol, heart attack, diabetes, chronic lung disease, asthma, cancer. And the date It was diagnosed? Q5L [Health/Medical History, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Health/Medical History, exam 2]
